General.barnahusInfoText: The chosen Barnahus is set and uneditable. Practitioners can only be added from their respective associated Barnahus.
General.searchMinInstructions: Enter minimum three characters for search
General.requiredFieldWarning: Fields marked with an asterisk (*) indicate their mandatory nature.
General.cancelDescription: If you cancel, all your data <important>will be lost</important>, and you'll need to start over.
General.itemsSelectedMessage: {count, plural, =0 {no followers yet} =1 {# item selected} other {# items selected}}.
General.assignedBarnahusInfoText: Once the Barnahus is added it will be assigned to this Master-admin, and the information will appear here.

ValidationMeseges.password: Please make sure your password meets the criteria.
ValidationMeseges.confirmPassword: Please make sure your passwords match.
ValidationMeseges.phone: Invalid phone number. Please try again.

Onboarding.title: Hi, welcome to Journeys
Onboarding.description: To enhance your clarity regarding your responsibilities, follow these steps to determine your tasks more easily.

Languages.noListDataDescription: In this section, Admins can input the languages for which they will supply content for the app.
Languages.statusInfoText: The status of the new language will consistently remain Inactive until it is employed in the content creation process. This status will automatically shift to an active state once the content in that language is published.
Languages.autoTranslateInfoText: Auto-translation is operative exclusively when the content has been published in the default language. This is owing to the fact that the translation process occurs from the default language to the selected language.
Languages.deleteLanguageDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete language please press delete.

Authorization.invalidLogin: Your password or/and email are invalid. Try again.

ResetYourPassword.title: Reset your password
ResetYourPassword.instructions: Enter your new password and you are ready to go!

ForgotPassword.instructions: Enter your email address associated with your account and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.successInstructions2: , please go to that email address and click on link that will redirect you to page where you are going to reset your.
ForgotPassword.resendInstructions: If mail was not delivered please click resend after countdown.

PasswordSuccessfullyChanged.title: Password successfully changed
PasswordSuccessfullyChanged.instructions: Please login to your account again.

Barnahuses.successfullyCreated: The Barnahus has been added & the Master-admin has been invited.
Barnahuses.addBarnahusDescription: Please note that the new Barnahus will be the central hub for adding all personnel at that location, including an Admin for content management and practitioners for custom case journeys.
Barnahuses.deleteBarnahusesDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete barnahuses please press delete.
Barnahuses.assignedMasterAdminInfoText: Once the assigned Master-admin for this Barnahus is added, the name will appear here.
Barnahuses.noListDataDescription: To begin, add all the Barnahuses to your library so that you can assign Admins to each one you've included.

Admins.deleteAdminDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete admins please press delete.
Admins.noListDataDescription: For this Barnahus you are able to add multiple Admins. This individual will be in charge of overseeing content for this specific Barnahus and adding their Practitioners to it.
Admins.addAdminDescription: Please note that <important>the Admin will receive an email invitation,</important> which will grant them access to the Journeys dashboard.

MasterAdmins.addAndAssignBarnahusDescription: Once you've added Master-admins, you'll need to add a Barnahus and assign each Master-admin to their respective Barnahus. Completing this process ensures that the Master-admins receives invitation and gains access to the app.
MasterAdmins.noListDataDescription: Add an Master-admin for every Barnahus you want to include. This individual will be in charge of overseeing content for that specific Barnahus and adding their Admins to it.
MasterAdmins.addMasterAdminDescription: Please note that the Master-admin <danger>will not receive an email invitation</danger> until you also add their Barnahus and assign it to this master-admin. Only then will they receive the invitation.
MasterAdmins.deleteMasterAdminDescription: Note: If you delete this Master-admin, they won't be able to access their profile anymore.
MasterAdmins.onboardingDescription: A Master-admin is responsible for maintaining the main dashboard and creating content for their respective Barnahus. Each Master-admin oversees their own Barnahus, with exclusive rights to invite other contributors (admins) to their Barnahus dashboard.

Practitioners.deletePractitionerDescription: If you are certain if you want to delete practitioners please press delete.
Practitioners.noListDataDescription: You will see a list of all the practitioners at your Barnahus here. You can add new practitioners, whether or not they plan to use the dashboard for customizing case journeys.
Practitioners.addPractitionerDescription: Please note that <important>the user will receive an email invitation,</important> which will grant them access to the Journeys dashboard.

ManageContent.selectContentDescription: You can make <guidelines>one content type per language</guidelines>. If you want the same content type in another language, create a new one and choose the language. <guidelines>Our software will translate it automatically,</guidelines> and you can adjust it as needed.
ManageContent.staffDescriptionPlaceholder: Write a short description about the Staff Member...
ManageContent.previewAndPublishContentDescription: Before publishing the content, please check how the content will look like in the Journeys app.
ManageContent.contentPublishedDescription: To prepare content in various languages, begin by searching for and selecting the specific language you intend to create content for next.
ManageContent.addAboutInfoText: Add more sections if you have more than five.
ManageContent.addRoomInfoText: Add more rooms if you have more than five.
ManageContent.roomsDescription: Here are five templates for rooms generally used in Barnahus. You can rename the rooms with any name your Barnahus uses.
ManageContent.waitingRoomTitlePlaceholder: Write the title of the room...
ManageContent.waitingRoomDescriptionPlaceholder: Write what the child can expect in the Waiting room...
ManageContent.selectLanguageDescription: Please select the language in which you'll write the content for the chosen content type.
ManageContent.description: In this section, Admins must provide detailed Barnahus information. Once entered, practitioners can choose what to display based on the case type.
ManageContent.noListDataDescription: In this section, Admins need to provide information about their Barnahus. This helps Practitioners choose the content they want to access in the application.
ManageContent.generalIntroductionPlaceholderTitle: Write the title of this section...
ManageContent.generalIntroductionPlaceholderDescriptio: Write some general intro text about your Barnahus...

CaseFiles.noListDataDescription: To begin, add all your Cases to your library so you can customize the Journey based on each Case ID.

CaseJourney.selectCaseIdDescription: To tailor an individual Case Journey, please choose or search for the desired Case ID within which you'd like to configure the specific Case Journey.
CaseJourney.selectBarnahusContentDescription: Pick the language and sections you want for the chosen Case to customize the Journey.
CaseJourney.selectRoomsContentDescription: Pick the language and sections you want for the chosen Case to customize the Journey.
CaseJourney.dragToRearrangeDescription: Rearrange the rooms at Barnahus based on each case's needs. You can delete any unrelevant rooms.

Settings.emailInstructions: To utilize your new email, it is essential to verify the updated address, as this will be the required login credential for access.
Settings.emailVerificationDialogDescription: To start using your new email, just verify the updated address as your new login. After confirming, log in again to update the email in your settings.

Templates.selectTemplateDescription: To create case from template, please choose or search for the desired template that suits your case best and modify it by your needs.
